name: Sharp Wave Ripples in Publicly Available Neuropixels Datasets
citation: Campbell, Angus (2024) Sharp Wave Ripples in Publicly Available Neuropixels Datasets (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001079/draft
keywords: LFP, Neuropixels, Hippocampus, CA1, Sharp Wave Ripples, SWR
description: We have extracted, curated using field standards, and shared over 2,054,021 SWR events from 258 mice from these datasets as well as the code used to process them.  Data is from Neuropixels LFP data from the Allen Brain Institute Visual Behaviour and Visual Coding Datasets as well as the International Brain Laboratory Decision Making Task Dataset.  SWR start stop times, peak ripple power, and peak power times are reported to allow for analysis with spiking and behavioral data in those datasets.
acknowledgement: This work was supported by a Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR) Foundation Grant FDN-143209 and project grant PJT-180631 to T.H.M. THM was also supported by the Brain Canada Neurophotonics Platform, a Heart and Stroke Foundation of Canada grant in aid, National Science and Engineering Council of Canada (NSERC; GPIN-2022-03723). This work was supported by resources made available through the Dynamic Brain Circuits cluster and the NeuroImaging and NeuroComputation Centre at the UBC Djavad Mowafaghian Centre for Brain Health (RRID SCR_019086) and made use of the DataBinge forum.  We thank the Pavlidis lab for generous use of compute and storage resources.
